content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-05-19 #25017 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.
The changes look fine but there are several CI errors which I don't understand in Mathlib/Tactic/Linter/TextBased.lean
The errors are likely caused by #24953, which was just merged.
@Anne Baanen, do you see what is going on here? Could you fix nightly-testing and this PR branch?
Ah yes, this needs a few small adaptations in pushing around the right argument type. I already tried that out when developing #24953. One moment please...

Looks like my fix still works: eecfbee.

This uses the linter sets declared up to Mathlib.Tactic.Linter.TextBased, which seems a plausible place to declare them for the style linters. (We might also just want to read them from the whole of Mathlib but that seems a big operation...)
Ah oops, also fixed the test now.
Hmm, I feel like I'm no longer competent to review the PR now :-)
LGTM, thanks @Kevin Buzzard for the initial look!
